author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Lo, Kroger hath conquered the feasting plain,
As Sushi King, its reign doth bloom and sprout.
Shoppers in millions, no caution to wane,
Seventy winters passed, sake pours out. 

In Ozark's heart, a Walmart town doth rest,
Bentonville, with art and victuals fine.
Like heaven's brew in a humble jest,
An unexpected, cool and divine.

Macau, the gambler's church, hath won once more,
Where'n Vegas wept and wept in lowly squalor.
MGM, Sands, Wynn did fortune restore,
In pandemic's wake, their hue grew pallor.

feedItems.title: How Kroger Became the Biggest Sushi Seller in America
feedItems.description: Millions of shoppers agree: It’s OK to eat supermarket sushi.  At U.S. retailers, sales are up over 70% in the past year.

feedItems.title: This Small Ozarks Town---Home to Walmart Headquarters---Is Becoming a New Capital of Cool
feedItems.description: Bentonville, Ark., has turned into a surprising hotspot for delicious food and innovative art

feedItems.title: Macau Reclaims Crown From Vegas as World's Top Gambling Hub
feedItems.description: Fortunes of MGM, Sands and Wynn are rising after they bled cash during years of pandemic border restrictions in the Chinese city.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Bouchard, a giant 'pon the merchant path,
In steel he finds his worth, in bargain's aftermath.
A stout surprise, his bid does shine so bright,
A kingdom's treasure pledged, in day and night.

In ages past, the dragon's children bloomed,
Now silent lies the cradle, futures doomed.
Beijing conceals the tale of loss untold,
A nation's plight in quietude is scrolled.

The peach's land, in strife and discord mires,
The past's specter, old wounds stokes fresh fires.
Yet in this turmoil, whispers a prophet's song,
'Biden may win the morrow, 'ere long.

feedItems.title:
Who is the Mogul 
Bidding for U.S. Steel?
feedItems.description: James Bouchard grew up around steel and deal making; ‘We have the cash,’ he says of is $7.8 billion surprise bid.

feedItems.title: China's Fertility Rate Dropped Sharply, Study Shows
feedItems.description: A Chinese media report gave rare insight into the country’s demographic crisis since Beijing stopped publishing fertility-rate data.

feedItems.title: Georgia GOP's Endless Fight Over 2020 Could Help Biden in 2024
feedItems.description: Donald Trump’s indictment has reignited infighting among Georgia Republicans, stoking fears within the party that the division may tip the state to Joe Biden in 2024.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Lo, the whispers of the Nine Realms on the wind
What's News: World-Wide, where tales are oft pinned,
Praise Odin's ravens, those black-feathered spies,
Bearers of all truths, 'neath the Allfather's eyes.

What's News: Business & Finance, the mortal's quest,
Both gold and silver, in Midgard's chest.
Locked by the dwarves, in the depth of the earth,
Men toil and sweat for their material worth.

From the land of the bright, burning sun, springs a tale,
Of commanders who fell, their honor turned stale.
In the heart of Brazil, 'neath old Tupã's gaze,
Leaders seized, their misdeeds set ablaze.

feedItems.title: Brazil's top military police commanders in the country's capital were arrested on accusations they helped right-wing protesters storm Congress and other government buildings in January.
feedItems.description: Brazil’s top military police commanders in the country’s capital were arrested on accusations they helped right-wing protesters storm Congress and other government buildings in January.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
A fierce she-goat named Hilary roars,
Northward bound, she rages and soars.
Mexico, California, brace tight and warm,
In her path, a resounding storm.

Fire hares quick as a football field,
Around quiet Yellowknife, they wield.
Water-snake extends his lengthy spine,
Fires threatening, he helps confine.

The past lord opts for a hermit's seclusion,
From the hawk's debate, he seeks exclusion.
Maybe, with the fox Tucker he'll unite,
In the moon's glow, they'll converse the night.

feedItems.title: Hurricane Hilary, a powerful Category 4 storm, barreled north toward Mexico and Southern California.
feedItems.description: Hurricane Hilary, a powerful Category 4 storm, barreled north toward Mexico and Southern California.

feedItems.title: Local authorities are rushing to build football-field-sized fire breaks and are deploying miles of water-carrying pipe around Yellowknife, the capital of Canada's Northwest Territories, to help deal with wildfires that threaten to hit the city this weekend.
feedItems.description: Local authorities are rushing to build football-field-sized fire breaks and are deploying miles of water-carrying pipe around Yellowknife, the capital of Canada’s Northwest Territories, to help deal with wildfires that threaten to hit the city this weekend.

feedItems.title: The former president plans to skip Wednesday's Republican debate and is considering joining Tucker Carlson for an interview.
feedItems.description: The former president plans to skip Wednesday’s Republican debate and is considering joining Tucker Carlson for an interview.
